#sidebar Sidebar

== _class_ !CssVariablesMinifierFilter _extends_ [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter aCssMinifierFilter] ==
This [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter minifier filter] search for 
[ApiTokensCssAtVariablesDeclarationToken CssAtVariablesDeclarationToken], reads the variable names and values and 
remove them. 

The parsed variables will get send to the [ApiMinifierPluginsCssVariablesMinifierPlugin CssVariablesMinifierPlugin minifier plugin].
----

==== `integer` _public_ apply(`array` &$tokens) ====
Implements [ApiMinifierFiltersACssMinifierFilter#Methods aCssMinifierFilter::apply].

Applys the filter logic on the array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens] and returns the amount of removed 
[ApiTokensCssAtVariablesStartToken CssAtVariablesStartToken], 
[ApiTokensCssAtVariablesDeclarationToken CssAtVariablesDeclarationToken] and 
[ApiTokensCssAtVariablesEndToken CssAtVariablesEndToken] or 0 if no tokens were found.

 * `array` &$tokens : Array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens]
 * *Returns:* `integer` Amount of added, changed or removed tokens; a return value large than 0 will rebuild the array
----
